DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , international , multi-center , non-randomized , single arm , open-label , postmarketing study investigate formation inhibitory anti-C1-INH antibody HAE subject treat intravenously Berinert . Individual treatment duration per subject 9 month , irrespective number treat attack . All subject receive 20 IU Berinert/kg body weight per attack .
DOC.brief_title: Postmarketing Immunogenicity Study HAE Subjects Treated With Berinert
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis congenital C1INH deficiency ( HAE type I II ) assess investigator likely require intravenous ( IV ) Berinert treatment study period . Male female , â‰¥ 12 year age time sign informed consent . Written inform consent study participation obtain undergo study specific procedure . Incurable malignancy last 6 month prior study entry . Acquired angioedema due C1INH deficiency . All type angioedema associate C1INH deficiency . Use C1INH product Berinert within 30 day study , plan use study . Immunization within 30 day prior study entry . Autoimmune condition require use immunosuppressant study . Known suspect hypersensitivity C1INH . Participation previous Berinert study antiC1INH antibody result submit Food Drug Administration .
